Display.Label: activeSessions.value, sessions
Display.Description: The number of sessions which exist in this zone.

Display.Label: readSession.count, ops
Display.Description: Number of times session data has been read with HttpSession.getValue() in this zone.

Display.Label: writeSession.count, ops
Display.Description: Number of times session data has been written with HttpSession.putValue() in this zone.

Display.Label: loadFailed.count, ops
Display.Description: Number of times we failed to load the requested application (does not work for OJSPs).

Display.Description: The number of requests processed during the last interval

Display.Description: The amount of time spent processing requests during the last interval

Display.Description: The time in seconds of the last interval

Display.Label: loadFailed.delta, failures
Display.Description: The number of load errors that occured during the last interval

Display.Label: readSession.rate, reads/sec
Display.Description: The number of reads of session data per second during the last interval

Display.Label: writeSession.rate, writes/sec
Display.Description: The number of writes of session data per second during the last interval

Display.Description: Maximum number of backlog requests that may be queued in the OS waiting for this JServ

Display.Description: OS process identifier for this JVM

Display.Description: Number of times session data has been written with HttpSession.putValue() in this zone.
